purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 栅)
Ideographic: A fence 冊 made of wood 木; 冊 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
柵條 [ zhà tiáo ]: paling; fence rail
柵欄 [ zhà lán ]: fence
柵門 [ zhà mén ]: gate; door with grating; turnstile; logical gate (electronics)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 冊 [ cè ] book, volume, register, list
heisig_chinese_memo: A palisade is a "fence of stakes especially for defense," usually the stakes are very strong, set closely together, and pointed on top. Tome can be seen as a pictograph of several close-set wooden stakes, braced by one horizontal bar.
koohiiStory1: A palisade is a "fence of stakes especially for defense," usually the stakes are very strong, set closely together, and pointed on top. Tome can be seen as a pictograph of several close-set wooden stakes, braced by one horizontal bar.
koohiiStory2: An army of scholars build a wooden palisade to protect their precious tome of literature.
kunYomi: しがら.む、しがらみ、とりで、やらい
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 亅 (зазубрина), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 木 (дерево), 冊 (том)
Ru_trainchinese:
zhà: (графема) забор, ограда, решетка
shān: (графема) (эл.) сетка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: volumes (冊) of trees (木) make a fence
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Imagine how many volumes of books you could from the trees it takes to build a palisade (strong fence) around a whole park.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood ", from " book ", " book " also sounds, the original meaning is a fence, that is, an obstruction surrounded by bamboo, wood, iron bars, etc. "Shuowen": "Arranging trees. From the wood to the book, the book is also sound." "Zhuangzi‧ Tiandi": "The inner support is over the chaizha."

" Fence " can mean setting up a fence. "Southern History-Cheng Wenji Biography": "Qin County's Qianjiangpu is covered with water, and the Qi people will join the big pillar to form a damp, and the water will be blocked."

" Zha " also refers to Yingzhai. "The Book of Chen-Gao Zu Ji": "The Gao Zu did his best to order the first soldiers of the army divisions to set up a voyage to Yecheng and attack the second gate of the south of the water.
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood ", from " book ", " book " also sounds, the original meaning is a fence, that is, a blocking object surrounded by bamboo, wood, iron bars, etc.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，從「冊」，「冊」亦聲，本義為柵欄，即用竹、木、鐵條等圍成的阻攔物。《說文》：「編樹木也。从木从冊，冊亦聲。」《莊子‧天地》：「內支盈於柴柵。」

　　「柵」可表示設立柵欄。《南史‧程文季傳》：「秦郡前江浦通涂水，齊人并下大柱為杙，柵水中。」

　　「柵」也指營寨。《陳書‧高祖紀上》：「高祖盡命眾軍分部甲卒，對冶城立航渡兵，攻其水南二柵。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，從「冊」，「冊」亦聲，本義為柵欄，即用竹、木、鐵條等圍成的阻攔物。

柵(さく): fence, paling

從「 木 」，從「 冊 」，「 冊 」亦聲，本義為柵欄，即用竹、木、鐵條等圍成的阻攔物。《說文》：「編樹木也。从木从冊，冊亦聲。」《莊子‧天地》：「內支盈於柴柵。」 「 柵 」可表示設立柵欄。《南史‧程文季傳》：「秦郡前江浦通涂水，齊人并下大柱為杙，柵水中。」 「 柵 」也指營寨。《陳書‧高祖紀上》：「高祖盡命眾軍分部甲卒，對冶城立航渡兵，攻其水南二柵。」
From " wood", from " book", " book" also sounds, the original meaning is a fence, that is, an obstruction surrounded by bamboo, wood, iron bars, etc. "Shuowen": "Arranging trees. From the wood to the book, the book is also sound." "Zhuangzi‧ Tiandi": "The inner support is over the chaizha." " Fence" can mean setting up a fence. "Southern History-Cheng Wenji Biography": "Qin County's Qianjiangpu is covered with water, and the Qi people will join the big pillar to form a damp, and the water will be blocked." " Zha" also refers to Yingzhai. "The Book of Chen-Gao Zu Ji": "The Gao Zu did his best to order the first soldiers of the army divisions to set up a voyage to Yecheng and attack the second gate of the south of the water.

柵字的基本解释

柵
shān
同“栅”。

柵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhà］
［《廣韻》所晏切，去諫，生。］
［《廣韻》測戟切，入陌，初。］
［《廣韻》楚革切，入麥，初。］
亦作“柵1”。
(1)栅栏。用竹、木、铁条等围成的阻拦物。
(2)谓立栅。
(3)指营寨。
(4)指村寨。唐韩愈孟郊有《莎栅联句》。
(5)编竹木搭建的浮桥。
(6)栅子，栏圈。
[②]［cè］
地名用字。广东省中山县有上栅、下栅。
[③]［shān］
见“栅3極”

柵字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　柵； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页521第07
【唐韻】楚革切【集韻】【韻會】測革切【正韻】恥革切，?音策。【說文】作柵，編樹木也。【廣韻】豎木以立柵也。【魏書·廣陽王傳】連營立柵。【莊子·天地篇】內支盈于柴柵。　又地名。【唐書·高崇文傳】戰于鹿頭柵。又韓愈與孟郊有《沙柵聯句》詩。　又【博雅】柵，棧也。　又【廣韻】測戟切，音踖。邨柵。　又【廣韻】【集韻】所晏切，音訕。籬柵。　又【集韻】數眷切，音?。編竹木爲落也。　又叶昌谷切，音尺。【歐陽脩·馴鹿詩】朝渴飮淸池，暮飽眠深柵。慙愧主人恩，殺身難報德。

柵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
柵字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Gate
shān
Same as "gate".
Gate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhà］
["Guangyun" Yan cut, went to admonish, and gave birth. ]
["Guangyun" test halberd cut, enter the mo, early. ]
["Guangyun" Chu Geqi, into wheat, early. ]
Also known as "gate 1".
(1) Fence. Block objects enclosed by bamboo, wood, iron bars, etc.
(2) It is called Licha.
(3) Refers to Yingzhai.
(4) Refers to the village. Tang Hanyu and Meng Jiao have "Shazha Lianju".
(5) Floating bridge constructed by weaving bamboo and wood.
(6) Fence, fence.
[②]［cè］
Place names in words. There are upper and lower gates in Zhongshan County, Guangdong Province.
[③] [shān]
See "Gate 3 Pole"
Gate
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　 Zha; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 521 07
[Tang Yun] Chu Geqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Test Geqie [Zhengyun] Shame and Geqie,? Sound policy. [Said the text] Make fences, weave trees. [Guang Yun] Vertical wood is also used to stand up the grid. [Wei Shu·Guangyang Wang Chuan] Lianying Lizha. [Zhuangzi·Heaven and Earth Chapter] The inner support is surpassing Chai Zha.　Also place name. [Tang Shu·Gao Chong Wen Biography] Fight at Lutouzha. And Han Yu and Meng Jiao have a poem "Shazha Lianju".　[Bo Ya] The gate, the stack.　[Guangyun] Test the halberd and cut, the sound is staggering. Village gate.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] cut by Yan, the sound is dissatisfied. Fence.　[Jiyun] Count and cut, sound?. Weaving bamboo and wood is also a fall.　 Ye Changgu cut again, the sound ruler. 【Ouyang Xiu·Reindeer Poems】The morning is thirsty and the pond is thirsty, and the evening is full of sleep. Ashamed of the master's kindness, it is hard to repay one's morals.
